Name: The Wicked Sorceress
About the game: Enter the Wicked Sorceress's lair in this fantasy first person shooter game! Fight your way using magic through waves of enemies and confront the Sorceress in an epic duel. Defeated by her new master, she lets you have your way with her. Warning: Cutscenes between levels contain uncensored nudity and strong adult only sexual content.
